attr.title: dRally
attr.desc: Death Rally is a vehicular combat racing video game developed by Remedy Entertainment, published by Apogee Software and distributed by GT Interactive.
attr.inst: The game needs the original assets, they are freely available. Download the DeathRallyWin_10.exe from https://www.chip.de/downloads/Death-Rally-Vollversion_38550689.html and place it into the ports/drally/ directory and it will be automatically extracted.
